text.more: CT0540 - Social Network Analysis (Author: André Ramolivaz, Supervisor: Fabiana Zollo): A Social Network Graph based on followers, tweet and mentions related to European Central Bank, Bank of England and Federal Reserve on the Twitter platform.Each node is a user and have several attribute including: profession, isInfluencer, language, isViral, isBank, hashtags.Each edge have 2 values: weight and type.The graph rappresents the different type of users based on their profession and the different type of edges: tweet, follows and mention.
text.intro: An Insight into Twitter Networks of Central Banks
